Verses: 1 oivu Naal Mudindhu, Vaaraththin Mudhalaam Naal Vidindhuvarugaiyil, Magadhalenaa Mariyaalum Matra Mariyaalum Kallaraiyaip Paarkka Vandhaargal.
2 appozhudhu, Boomi Migavum Adhirumpadi, Karththarudaiya Thoodhan Vaanaththilirundhirangi Vandhu, Vaasalilirundha Kallaip Purattith Thalli, Adhinmel Utkaarndhaan.
3 avanudaiya Roobam Minnal Polavum, Avanudaiya Vasthiram Uraindha Mazhaiyaippola Venmaiyaagavum Irundhadhu.
4 kaavalaalar Avanukkup Payandhadhinaal Thidukkittuch Cheththavarkal Polaanaargal.
5 thoodhan Andha Sthireegalai Nokki: Neengal Payappadaadhirungal; Siluvaiyil Araiyappatta Yesuvaith Thedugireergal Endru Ariven.
6 avar Inge Illai; Thaam Sonnapadiye Uyirththezhundhaar; Karththarai Vaiththa Idaththai Vandhu Paarungal;

7 seekkiramaaip Poi, Avar Mariththorilirundhu Ezhundhaar Endru Avarudaiya Seeshargalukku Sollungal. Avar Ungalukku Munne Kalileyaavukkup Pogiraar; Ange Avaraik Kaanpeergal; Idho, Ungalukku Sonnen Endraan.
8 avargal Payaththodum Magaa Santhoshaththodum Kallaraiyai Vittu Seekkiramaaip Purappattu, Avarudaiya Seeshargalukku Arivikka Odinaargal.
9 avargal Avarudaiya Seeshargalukku Arivikkap Pogirapodhu, Yesu Thaame Avargalukku Edhirpattu: Vaazhka Endraar. Avargal Kittavandhu, Avar Paadhangalaith Thazhuvi, Avaraip Panindhukontaargal.
10 appozhudhu Yesu Avargalai Nokki: Payappadaadhirungal; Neengal Poi, En Sakodharar Kalileyaavukkup Pogumpadi Avargalukku Sollungal; Ange Avargal Ennaik Kaanpaargal Endraar.
11 avargal Pogaiyil, Kaaval Sevagaril Silar Nagaraththirkulle Vandhu, Nadandha Yaavatraiyum Piradhaana Aasaariyarukku Ariviththaargal.
12 ivargal Moopparode Koodivandhu, Aalosanaipanni, Sevagarukku Vendiya Panaththaik Koduththu:
13 naangal Niththiraipannugaiyil, Avanudaiya Seeshargal Iraaththiriyile Vandhu, Avanaik Kalavaaik Kondu Poivittaargal Endru Sollungal.
14 idhu Thesaadhipadhikkuk Kelviyaanaal, Naangal Avarai Sammadhappaduththi, Ungalaith Thappuvippom Endraargal.
15 avargal Panaththai Vaangikkondu, Thangalukkup Podhikkappattapadiye Seydhaargal. Indhap Pechchu Yoodharukkulle Innaalvaraikkum Pirasiththamaayirukkiradhu.
16 padhinoru Seeshargalum, Kalileyaavile Yesu Thangalukkuk Kuriththirundha Malaikkup Ponaargal.
17 ange Avargal Avaraik Kandu Panindhukontaargal, Silaro Sandhegappattaargal.
18 appozhudhu Yesu Sameebaththil Vandhu, Avargalai Nokki: Vaanaththilum Boomiyilum Sagala Adhikaaramum Enakkuk Kodukkappattirukkiradhu.
19 aagaiyaal, Neengal Purappattuppoi Sagala Jaadhigalaiyum Seesharaakki, Pidhaa Kumaaran Parisuththa Aaviyin Naamaththile Avargalukku Gnaanasnaanangoduththu,

20 naan Ungalukkuk Kattalaiyitta Yaavaiyum Avargal Kaikkollumpadi Avargalukku Ubadhesam Pannungal; Idho, Ulagaththin Mudivupariyandham Sagala Naatkalilum Naan Ungaludanekooda Irukkiren Endraar. Aamen.
